entry.title: How to colossally fuck shit up
entry.summary:
Author: Cashewchococake

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,314Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 14

Summary: Fix it-fic for the movie, starts after Derek's death when he is brought back to life by our favorite divorced FBI-agent.One thing leads to another and they have sex, all kinds of stuff happens after that. This fic is going to be chaotic and weird, I'm not sure how long it will be but it will be longer than this.This is the first fan-fic I have ever written, and English is not my first language so I apologize in advance of the mistakes I might make in doing this fic.

entry.title: Derek's Most Prized Possession
entry.summary:
Author: SterekLoverForEver

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,916Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 21

Summary: That dumb bitch. A stupid fucking witch. She just had to come to Beacon Hills after things had been quiet.Luring the pack out thinking it was Stiles as if he’d asked the pack to meet at the preserve in the middle of the night. The pack stands, surrounding the witch in a circle. She looks at the pack before picking her victim. She runs to attack Stiles but Derek jumps in front of him at the last second.“Derek! NO!” Stiles yells but it’s too late. The witch looks stunned before grinning; she cackles before punching Derek in the chest. A bolt of lightning shoots out of her hands and into Derek. He slumps to the floor growling. The pack runs to their alpha to stop the witch from doing more harm.She stands over Derek. “You’ll kill your mate and your pack, you won’t be able to control the chaos inside. Too bad I won’t be here to see it.” She shrugs her shoulders before snapping her fingers and disappearing. The pack looks around to see if they can find her, when they turn up blank they turn back to Derek

entry.title: Iskra Nadziei (Spark of Hope)
entry.summary:
Author: thefluffybanana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,034Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 19

Summary: PROMPT: What if after the Nogitsune, nobody trusts that Stiles is actually Stiles? What if Stiles was actually a Spark? What if All it takes for Stiles to realize what he was meant to be is for his life to fall apart?ORStiles is rejected by the pack and while he tries to find a way to salvage his crumbling life he gets a mysterious letter from a family member that he thought was dead. Deciding to follow this letter all the way to Poland Stiles hopes to rebuild his confidence in his self and his abilities.P.S. It's gonna be a slow burn to the fullest because I want to explore Stiles as a character first before we get to the main pair. So prepare your heart for all the angst!

entry.title: Wolfbane Whiskey: Isabelle’s Reckless Fun
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 809Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: The pack gathers at a lively bar for a night of drinking, dancing, and letting loose. Special wolfbane-infused whiskey allows the supernatural members to actually feel a buzz, while humans are strictly warned to avoid it. Isabelle, ever the rebellious spirit, gets her hands on the strong drink and ends up joyfully twirling on the dance floor, drawing attention from more than just her packmates.Peter watches his beta closely, growing increasingly possessive as she dances without a care in the world. Meanwhile, Stiles and Derek’s relationship is on full display, with Stiles reveling in being affectionate, much to Derek’s reluctant amusement. The pack enjoys the chaos, knowing that Peter’s patience is wearing thin.As Isabelle continues to push her limits, Peter decides enough is enough, leading to a dramatic moment that leaves the entire pack entertained—and Isabelle realizing she may have gone a little too far.

entry.title: Waiting In The Wings
entry.summary:
Author: stereksterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,493Chapters: 3/7Kudos: 87

Summary: Melissa folded her arms and stared at Stiles, “I’m still having a hard time believing that Derek Hale, of all people, is your boyfriend now.”“Yep! Derek’s my boyfriend! We’re totally rocking the whole relationship thing. I mean, we’re no Scott and Allison when it comes to PDA, but we’re both very affectionate behind closed doors. It’s kind of hilarious actually, because some people think that Derek doesn’t even like me when we’re in public, just because he growls or glares at me from time to time. But we’re just a misunderstood couple, y’know… Kind of like other star-crossed lovers out there. We’re basically this generation’s Romeo and… Miguel.”Melissa was grinning so wide that her face almost hurt. Stiles had wildly overcompensated, and now she knew he was lying.“If you and Derek are boyfriends, you won’t have a problem inviting him over for dinner then.”Stiles malfunctioned for a full second before squawking like a dying bird, “Dinner?!”

entry.title: Sins of the Mother
entry.summary:
Author: sifshadowheart

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 222,938Chapters: 43/?Kudos: 1,552

Summary: Stiles Stilinski was never supposed to be anything other than plain, boring, vanilla human.Blood, magic, and tears had been sacrificed since long before his birth to ensure it.Unfortunately, no one ever told Stiles that - or the psychopaths that liked to set up shop and wreak havoc in Beacon Hills.Psychopaths who should have been a little more careful about who they targeted.And exactly what kind of monsters were hiding inside their blood and bones.

entry.title: DON’T DIE, DUMBASS
entry.summary:
Author: Noctirax

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,921Chapters: 2/5Kudos: 15

Summary: Stiles was certain—utterly certain—there had been someone in the middle of the road. Sure, the figure had moved with an unnatural quickness, vanishing as suddenly as he appeared but that didn't mean anything. Just standard Beacon Hills bullshit—home to the strange and unexplained. No, that wasn't what bothered him. What bothered him was that he hadn’t just seen someone. He’d seen someone he was damn sure he knew. Dark hair against pale skin, and leather jacket over broad shoulders, body squared, braced for impact. It was a posture Stiles had seen countless times, most often standing between him and something that was trying to rip his throat out. For a fleeting second, amidst the screech of tires and the adrenaline flooding his system, Stiles could have sworn he’d seen Derek Hale standing in the middle of the road. Only that wasn't possible because Derek was dead, very, very dead.

entry.title: Cologne 2: Electric Bugaboo
entry.summary:
Author: blueinkedbones

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,420Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 34

Summary: “It was an accident,” Stiles says. “Derek, it's not even bad, I swear.”But there are—claw marks on Stiles' shoulder. Still bleeding.And his heartbeat is going a thousand miles an hour.“It's not Eli's fault,” Stiles says, and Derek goes deaf, for a while. Stiles is still talking, rambling, excusing all of it. Derek just breathes, and pulls pain.It takes too long to remember that human bleeding doesn't stop on its own. And then—Derek's speeding through the hotel room.Bandages. And—disinfectant, isn't that—There should be a first aid kit somewhere.“I should've just found a band-aid or something,” Stiles says. “Or asked one of the million people we know who were around. I just... Eli wouldn't wanna be a funny anecdote.”That brings Derek's voice back. “How is this funny? He hurt you.”“See, this is why I didn't wanna tell you,” Stiles says, and Derek stares at him. “Until after the wedding, at least. So I could actually explain, without our whole extended werewolf family catching everything.”Well, they're alone now. “So explain.”

entry.title: I Hated You!
entry.summary:
Author: Unknown_Hoe

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,913Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 117

Summary: Mieczyslaw Stilinkski, or as most called him Stiles, was adopted by a sheriff and his wife in Beacon Hills, and with that, most of his past vanished. That was until his mother Claudia died when he was eight, and Noah Stilinkski decided it was time to dig up the past and put it together to give it to Stiles later. Stiles uncovered this when he turned seventeen, and he was almost killed again.Stiles had been given the documents that his father had been able to put together. Learning his real name, he was shocked that his mother kept his first name, but his last name was completely foreign, and it seemed like home. Mieczyslaw Mikaelson seemed like home; of course, he still loved his father even after knowing he was his adoptive father. After taking time to swallow the pills of his past, Stiles ran to tell Scott and Derick about the new information he had learned about his life.

entry.title: Alone Together
entry.summary:
Author: YourDarling04

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,012Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 114

Summary: It was a Tuesday morning when they got the call.“Hello?”“Hello, is this Jonathan Stilinski?”“Yeah, that's me.”“I'm calling in relation to a Mic-Misz-”"We just call him Stiles. What's he done now?”“Mr. Stilinski… I'm so sorry for your loss.”In which Peter gains a pack and a family, but remember children, nothing good comes for free.

entry.title: Fingers Crossed
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 324,899Chapters: 29/40Kudos: 829

Summary: “Have you ever heard of the butterfly effect?”He looked up and shook his head. “No… what is it?”“It’s the idea that the smallest of situations, can set the biggest consequences in motion. A butterfly flapping it’s wings on one side of the world, creates a hurricane on the other.”He nodded, that’s exactly how this situation sounds right now. If he and Scott never went out that fateful night and looked for that body, or if he and Derek never became friends, or hell, if he never agreed to Deatons plan in the first place… then none of this would be happening.But fuck it, ‘caution’ isn’t in his vocabulary.~~~UPDATES BIWEEKLY <3
